mapper.insert: insert ignore into favourite_book_audio(openid, bookAudioId) value (#{openid}, #{bookAudioId});
insert ignore into favourite_short_audio(openid, shortAudioId) value (#{openid}, #{shortAudioId});
mapper.select: select fba.openid, fba.bookAudioId, ba.name as name, b.name as bookName, ba.bookId as bookId, ifnull((select 1 from thumb_book_audio t where t.openid = #{openid} and t.bookAudioId = fba.bookAudioId limit 1), 0) as thumbed, count(tba.openid) as thumb, 1 as favourite from favourite_book_audio fba join book_audio ba on fba.bookAudioId = ba.id join book b on ba.bookId = b.id left join thumb_book_audio tba on fba.bookAudioId = tba.bookAudioId where fba.openid = #{openid} group by tba.bookAudioId;

select fsa.openid, fsa.shortAudioId, actId, actName, content, fileName, sa.title, u.name, u.majorAndClass, u.avatarUrl, ifnull((select 1 from thumb_short_audio t where t.openid = #{openid} and t.shortAudioId = fsa.shortAudioId limit 1), 0) as thumbed, count(tsa.openid) as thumb, 1 as favourite from favourite_short_audio fsa join short_audio sa on fsa.shortAudioId = sa.id join user u on fsa.openid = u.openid left join thumb_short_audio tsa on sa.id = tsa.shortAudioId where fsa.openid = #{openid} and approved = true group by fsa.shortAudioId
